Operation 'Api_CheckInWithText' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is good, but description lacks clarity about text report inclusion (inconsistent with audio variant), missing return value information, and missing side effects about state changes. Enhanced description clarifies the text attachment, specifies return data, and documents the monitoring state update.

data.current_summary: Check in with a text report
data.current_description: This operation checks the worker in for a default time or a custom time if the optional interval is provided.
data.description_suggestion: This operation checks the worker in for a default time or a custom time if the optional interval is provided, and includes a text report attachment. Returns confirmation of the check-in event with timestamp and duration. Updates the worker's monitoring state.
data.reasoning: Summary is good, but description lacks clarity about text report inclusion (inconsistent with audio variant), missing return value information, and missing side effects about state changes. Enhanced description clarifies the text attachment, specifies return data, and documents the monitoring state update.

message: Operation 'Api_Emergency' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is overly vague with minimal actionable information. Missing details about what inputs are accepted, what the operation returns, and critical side effects (notifications, monitoring protocol activation). Enhanced description explains the emergency declaration process, expected inputs, return values, and state changes for better AI agent understanding.

data.description_suggestion: This operation declares an emergency for the specified user, triggering immediate alert notifications to monitors and relevant contacts. Initiates emergency monitoring protocol and notifies all assigned monitors.

message: Operation 'Api_End' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is extremely vague with no actionable details. data.current_description: This operation checks the worker in for a default time or a custom time if the optional interval is provided.

data.description_suggestion: Updates the itinerary for a specified worker by uploading a file. Requires company ID and user ID as path parameters. Accepts an itinerary file (e.g., CSV, JSON, or other supported format) in the request body. Parses and validates the file content, then replaces the existing itinerary with the new data. Returns confirmation of successful file upload and processing, or validation errors if the file format is invalid.

data.current_description: The operation adds a text message to the worker's event history.
data.summary_suggestion: Report text message to event history
data.description_suggestion: Records a text message in the worker's event history for monitoring and documentation purposes. Requires company ID and user ID as path parameters. Accepts text message content in the request body. Returns confirmation of successful message recording with timestamp and event ID. The message is permanently added to the worker's event history and becomes part of the monitoring record.
